features: ⭐【EXCELLENT CONFIGURATION】The free "Walk Print"APP is built for users. The bluetooth photo printer adopts high-quality ink-free thermal print head, though bluetooth to connect Android or iOS systems, high-quality print head resolution up to 203dpi, mini printed sticker maker is qualified sticker printer and flexible label maker ~ ready to print all kinds of required labels and stickers. Built-in 1000mAH lithium battery, fully charged mini portable printer can work for 15 hours!

👍【EASY TO USE】According to the manual, download the "Walk Print" APP through phone; open the note printer box containing the printing paper, put in the type of printing paper you need to use, after the mini bluetooth printer is turned on, connect the APP on the mobile phone through Bluetooth, you can print. If you receive a defective sticker printer machine or have any questions about our portable photo printer, please contact us anytime, we will try our best to give you the best solution.

🖨️【INKLESS NOTES PRINTER MINI】The size of the the inkless pocket printer is 3.54x3.23x1.77 inches. This pocket printer is small and portable, can be put into your pocket or bag, the portable printer for phone can immediately print out the phone recordings, photos and documents needed for photos, record your life, work and study anytime and anywhere, it is the ideal accessory for students, travelers and anyone who needs to take a portable mini printer.

🧻【FULLY EQUIPPED PRINTER KIT】The mini sticker printer in the kit does not require ink, toner or ribbon. Use thermal paper instead of ink, save money, the mini thermal printer kit comes with 1 rolls of paper (Installed inside the the mini picture printer), Printed black and white photos can be graffiti and share parent-child graffiti time with your children.

🎁【WIDE RANGE OF USE】This mini inkless printer is suitable for printing black and white photos, documents, recordings, memos, web pages, labels, barcode stickers, post-it notes, and can also be fixed for horizontal or vertical printing. Our mini pocket printer is great gift for birthday, Christmas, graduation, trave, school gifts, and Children's Day. Suitable for children, family members, students, friends, teachers, businessmen, travelers and others who need this practical mini pho

reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars it stopped working after one print
reviews.reviewText: This product is really cute and I used it once perfectly. But now it keeps saying that the “lid is not closed” or something? I have it shut firmly and everything is inserted correctly, but it refuses to print anymore. Will be returning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Honestly I didn't expect much from this printer, but it rose to the task well o.o I'd say 5 stars but the build feels kind of flimsy and the markers had leaked (no damage to printer) so I took a star for that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Everything like a real printer u would say

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for printing labels/receipts!
reviews.reviewText: For the price point, I am very happy with this product. It does what it advertises to do and I have had no issues with it. The app was really easy to follow. Within 5 minutes I was able to print out my mini logos to put on my cuticle oil bottle for my nail business. I also love the minimalist cat design! I included a picture of the prints I was able to make with this.DISCLAIMER!Make sure your paper is facing the right direction! I thought mine was faulty when I tried making my first print till I reread the instructions and found I had the paper facing the wrong way. After that, everything printed out smoothly. Personally, prints come out better when the color is set to moderate and above!

reviews.reviewText: App is Chinese so some things don't translate but a good device to learn on. Great value
